name: VR Beach 2
description:
Enjoy our new relaxing beach scene with much more beautiful nature graphics and better calming ambience sounds for free!
We created this very nice little landscape for your enjoyment in exciting virtual reality!
Just lay back and take a timeout from your everyday life.

New Features:

- Completely redesigned from scratch
- Much better looking graphics
- Reduced loading time
- Performance optimizations
- Reduced file size
- Daydream support
- Realtime shadows

*Cardboard required*

We do support Android too! Check out your Play Store for more Information!

More exciting features coming soon!
Please vote for our app so that we will be adding more VR apps soon!
If you are experiencing any bugs feel free to contact us, we're still learning.

Many Thanks to Dieter Steffmann for the beautiful Marker Felt Font.
